name: __SkeletalMeshTerminationCriterion
doc: Enum specifying the reduction type to use when simplifying skeletal meshes with internal tool

SMTC_NumOfTriangles: Triangle count criterion will be used for simplification.
SMTC_NumOfVerts: Vertex cont criterion will be used for simplification.
SMTC_TriangleOrVert: Simplification will continue until either Triangle or Vertex count criteria is met.
SMTC_AbsNumOfTriangles: Triangle count criterion will be used for simplification.
SMTC_AbsNumOfVerts: Vertex cont criterion will be used for simplification.
SMTC_AbsTriangleOrVert: Simplification will continue until either Triangle or Vertex count criteria is met.
